array.string: Check with a magnifying camera for polarity.
Check well solder, short solder, dry solder.
Connect flashing fixture with a PC.
Select Sentinel flashing file from the program folder.
Load PCB in fixture, select flashbat file from the Flashing folder and double click, wait for completion.

dict.string: LED Blink Test by Connecting Battery

array.string: Take successfully flashed PCB, Hook battery and daughter board with PCB.
Ensure that LED blink RED, GREEN, BLUE and YELLOW respectively. Blue, Red and Green On-Off LED and Yellow and Red is a charging LED.

dict.string: Current Checking by Meter (By Connecting Power BAT)

array.string: Take above PCB and connect daughter board.
Connect the digital multimeter in series with battery in current mode. Make sure the probe is concerned.
Check Current when the unit is Off, When pressed the on button and completely started working current 0 MA, bellow 16 MA, bellow 40 MA respectively.
Take LED successfully tested PCB connect battery and daughter board.
Turn on the unit and iPod
Connect this unit with iPod in Setting.
Open sentinel next app see on app. Be sure unit is connected.
Connect Dual Probe see temperature, Connect RH see temperature and humidity.
Take one PCB which is connected to the battery and hook daughter board.
Press On/Off button and test its blinks in Red, Green, and Blue Color.
Connect charging cable and check it charging LED will be Red.
Remove battery connect charging USB again and test the charging LED will Green.
Take one PCB which is connected to the battery and hook daughter board.
Press On/Off button and test its blinks in Red, Green, and Blue Color.
Connect charging cable and check it charging LED will be Red.
Remove battery connect charging USB again and test the charging LED will Green.
Take one PCB which is connected to the battery and hook daughter board.
Press On/Off button and test its blinks in Red, Green, and Blue Color.
Connect charging cable and check it charging LED will be Red.
Remove battery connect charging USB again and test the charging LED will Green.

dict.string: Daughter Board Button Insert and Test

array.string: Take a top body face of a sentinel next with display with a labeled sticker.
Before inserting a button to remove the burr on the outer side of that button.
Insert two spacer button in a required position.
Fix the daughter board in six stand over the spacer button.
Test the buttons.

dict.string: Daughter Board Fitting By Thermal Element

array.string: Fit the rivetting tool with the solder gun.
Set temperature near about 300^C and melt the six stand where daughter board is placed.
Take the top face of sentinel next which have display mounting. Solder a 4 wire of different length according to the documentation. Solder four wire (Tp10, Tp7, 2 of U7 Chips).
Enlarge the existing holes on top enclosure ,2 of diameter 7.8 mm and 1 of diameter 2- 5 mm.
This is done to remove thin layer above the holes of top enclosure.
Deburr the excess material which gets accumulated during drilling using blade and clean the surface using cloth.
Fix the LCD display using glue stick to the top enclosure by melting the glue stick using glue gun.Use the fixture to keep the display at proper position.
Fill the gap between display and top enclosure with white cement paste and level it.Fix it using fevicol.
Stick the label so that all switch symbols are aligned properly.
Fix the daughter board using small Spacer buttons at appropriate switch positions.
Set temperature near about 300^C and Melt the column on which daughterboard is mounted to fix it.

dict.string: Sticking Stickers and Foam on Bottom.

array.string: Take bottom stickers and stick the stickers on the inner side of the bottom.
Stick the Foam tape of 6mm, 4mm.
Take a top of daughter board fix and bottom with sticked sticker and foams.
Connect the battery with PCB board, Fix a board in a top.
Fix the battery on bottom adjust its wire assemble Top and Bottom.
Visually check the printing on the bottom. Be sure that Aginova logo, Company name being well printed.
Bottom should be scratch less, dent less (Ensure that the printing on backside of enclosure (top & bottom) is readable)
Check visually separation between Top and Bottom should be parallel at all the side.
Press the four corners and see its perfectly locked.
Also observe the slot of probe and charger.
Turn On sensor unit.
Take iPod, turn On iPod. Open the Sentinel next application.
Connect the unit with iPod by selecting sentinel SSID.
Check Battery status that voltage must be 3- 9 Volt to 4- 2 Volt on app.
Connect probe to unit see its temperature on app.
Put the probe sensor in hot water and observe the rise in temperature.
Connect RH or humidity sensor and observe its humidity on app.
Check if Red LED is blinking when charger is connected.
Check the battery status in App, battery status should be atleast 1/4th Of the total charge.
Check Battery status that voltage must be 3- 9 Volt to 4- 2 Volt on app.
Check if Green LED is blinking when we turn on a unit.
Press the WiFi mode button LED will turn Green to Blue.
Check If Red LED is blinking an after 3-4 Sec. its stop blinking when you turn Off unit or when press On/Off button.
Clean the unit with damp cloth to remove dust/fingerprints/other marks on enclosure.
Clean unit by using IPA solution
Be careful that printed (logo or Symbol) should not be removed while cleaning.
Put the unit in a bubble bag and hold it with rubber band & place it in tray.
Take cleaned unit, put in the plastic bag and fold it well.
Apply the rubber band on it.
Once the tray is filled with 25 items,take the lot & put it into unit boxes with 45 units.
Apply tape at all joints.
Using permanent marker write product name, quantity & date of packing,initials of the operator .
